name: Pong Remake (Forbidden Duck)
description:
Pong Remake | Last Beta Release | V 4.0.0

Full Release is currently being developed!

GameJolt Link

This is a simple remake of Pong the old Arcade game where two Rackets on either side who bounce a Ball and the first person to 3 points wins

I have decided to make it a bit more extreme, obviously we haven't gotten far as I am new to developing. I can say one thing there will be a Level Selector shocking.

Controls
  • Left Racket:
    Move Up = W
    Move Down = S
  • Right Racket:
    Move Up = UP
    Move Down = DOWN
  • Return to Main Menu (While Playing)
    Escape(ESC) = Return
  • Return to Main Menu (While in Win Screen)
    Escape(ESC) = Return
  • Return to Game (While in Win Screen)
    Enter = Return to Game
